description:
Shoes, every woman loves to buy many of them! This dataset contains historical stock data of Skechers. It is a famous brand; Skechers sells comfortable footwear for men, women, and children worldwide. The company was founded in 1992 and it is the 3rd largest footwear brand in the US. 

I retrieved this dataset with Skechers' historical stock prices from Yahoo Finance.  I picked a time period spanning from January 1st, 2000 until 2023. I update the dataset monthly. The dataset contains daily stock data: the open and closing price at which the stock began and ended trading, and the highest and lowest price at which the stock traded that day.
title: Skechers Historical Stock Data
